Name of Agency to Which this Form Applie: U.S. Department of Energy/Energy Information Administration (EIA)
Additional Scope Comments: Energy Information Administration is a component of the Department of Energy with its own records  management office. Non-Capstone officials , staff, contractors and other support and/or administrative positions will be managed as temporary email (retained for 7 years) scheduled under  GRS 6.1, item 011 or as temporary email (retained for 3 years) scheduled under GRS 6.1, item 012.
Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff of email will be by employee tenure
Transfer Instructions: Records will be transferred when 15 years old.
Legacy Email Scope: Legacy email is not included in the Capstone categorization, as traditional records management with a print-and-file policy was followed prior to Capstone adoption.
URL to Agency Organization Chart: http://www.eia.gov/about/printer_friendly_org_chart.pdf Please see attached EIA organizational chart
Contact Information for Agency Records O: Donna Williams, EIA Records Officer Email:  Donna.Williams@eia.govTel: 202.586.3270

Name of Agency to Which this Form Applie: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Additional Scope Comments: CDC is a component of the Department of Health and Human Services.  CDC is maintaining the emails of the CDC Director and all agency executives.  The emails will be transferred to the National Archives fifteen years after the end of the employee tenure.
Legacy Email Scope: CDC will be including legacy emails dating back to October 2014, that were retained by each executive in their email account.

Additional Scope Comments: Staff have been instructed to label any non-record email as "Non-Record." The email records management system will ignore such messages. Staff may retain or delete non-record email at their discretion (and up to the volume limit of their accounts). This GRS will account of all email records using Items 010 and 011.
Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff of email will be by employee tenure.
Transfer Instructions: Transfer to NARA when 15 years old.
Legacy Email Scope: NARA adopted the Capstone approach on 23 January 2013 with the transition to Gmail. Application of this GRS will also include any available legacy email migrated from the previous email platform (Groupwise) to the current system.
